definition: to close one's eyes/to get to sleep
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to touch an elephant with closed eyes (idiom); to proceed blindly

sentences.english: After being sleepless for more than 48 hours, I began to hallucinate.
sentences.chinese: 在48个多小时未合眼后，我开始产生幻觉。

sentences.english: In order to finish this paper, he stayed up all night.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成这篇论文他整夜没有合眼。

sentences.english: You always appear when I close my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 合眼闭眼睛，出现的全是你。

sentences.english: Mary lay awake almost the whole night.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽躺在那儿，几乎一夜没合眼。

sentences.english: The old duck quacked and quacked so I hardly slept a wink last night.
sentences.chinese: 老鸭子呱呱直叫，吵得我昨晚几乎一夜没合眼。

sentences.english: She lay awake all night, thinking the matter over and over again.
sentences.chinese: 她躺在床上左思右想，一夜也没合眼。

sentences.english: The patient's dangerous condition cost the doctors and nurses many a sleepless night.
sentences.chinese: 病人的危险状况，使医生和护士们好几夜不曾合眼。

sentences.english: Our next-door neighbours were so noisy last night that we didn't get a wink of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上我们隔壁的邻居特别吵闹使我们一夜没合眼。

sentences.english: Riddles are written on lanterns for people to guess.
sentences.chinese: 单身人士会聚集在灯会猜猜灯谜，找个合眼缘的人。

sentences.english: She stayed awake the whole night at the thought of being sent to the West.
sentences.chinese: 一想到要被派往西部，她整夜未合眼。

sentences.english: But none of them would sleep that night either.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他们今晚仍然谁也别想合眼。

definition: the whole night/all through the night
without stopping to sleep or have a rest (idiom)
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
to lie down to sleep with one's clothes on
to toss and turn (sleeplessly)/again and again
